snippet: There is an old saying in politics that nobody runs for Vice President. So just what was it that Gov. Christine Todd Whitman of New Jersey was doing this week for three long, hard days as she worked the speech and news-conference circuit of vote-r...
lead_paragraph: There is an old saying in politics that nobody runs for Vice President. So just what was it that Gov. Christine Todd Whitman of New Jersey was doing this week for three long, hard days as she worked the speech and news-conference circuit of vote-rich Southern California? The Governor denied at every stop that she was running after a spot on the 1996 Republican ticket.

headline.main: Whitman, in California, Fields the Vice-Presidency Question
